item.title: Flight Fare Prediction: Let's Find the Best Rates
item.description: Visit the Project GitHub repository for code and more information. The recent pandemic has caused many limitations that have led to inflation, and, as a result, air ticket prices have increased dramatically over the last few years. This has made many airlines unprofitable and insolvent, which has then caused significant travel disruptions and 2.3 million job losses in aviation. Even before the pandemic, air ticket prices had been erratic. This is because air travel is the most expensive and only worldwide rapid transportation method that connects people and business.
